title: The List of Returning Exiles
summary: This chapter lists the names and numbers of the exiles who returned to Judah under Zerubbabel’s leadership. It includes priests, Levites, and temple servants, emphasizing their heritage and devotion.

faq.question: Why are the names and families listed?
faq.answer: To record those who returned and to affirm their connection to God’s covenant people.
